article_title: Officials’ round a step in Lancaster's preparation for 2015 U.S. Women’s Open
article_text: Mike Gross is a Lancaster Newspapers sports writer and columnist who covers Penn State football. He also blogs at Billy Paultz Reconsidered. He can be reached at mgross@lnpnews.com or (717) 291-8688. You can also follow @Mikegrss on Twitter.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , u.s. women's open, lancaster country club
article_metadata.author: MIKE GROSS | Sports Writer

og.description: USGA and Open officials Dan Burton, Jerry Hostetter and Ben Kimball are among those playing a round at Lancaster Country Club considering what next year's contestants may face.
